decision_conditions: The proposed changes to the roof design would introduce an incongruous and awkward roof form that would be out of keeping with the approved pattern of development in the area, contrary to policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policy 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). Therefore it is considered that the proposal does not fall within the provisions of s73 of the Town and Country Planning Act or the Council's Protocol for Minor Material Amendments.
description: Application for a Minor Material Amendment (S73.a) for the variation of condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission ref: 230388FUL dated 30/03/2023 for: Conversion of dwellinghouse into four self-contained residential dwellings; single storey front extension; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension to main roofslope; installation of two rooflights to front roofslope; two storey side extension with rear dormer roof extension; part single and part two storey rear/side extension; internal and external alterations; and provision of associated amenity space, refuse/recycling and cycle storage (following demolition of the existing garages). Amendment seeks revision and modification of the roof plan
